overview: It’s time for another term at everyone’s favourite boarding school, where the students just can’t wait for the lessons to end so that they can concentrate on the only subject that interests them – the male anatomy! And it’s most definitely top marks for the role-call in this horny escapade, as the likes of Tim Law, Connor Levi and the A-Grade Aussie cock-loving supremo, Jaxon Radoc, get all clued up to go top of the class. Has studying ever looked so much fun? Or produced quite so much spunk?!
title: Bareback Boarders 3
